select id, title, longitude, latitude, open_time as openTime,
st_distance_sphere(point(longitude, latitude), point(#{param.longitude}, #{param.latitude})) as distance,
cover_url as coverUrl, logo_url as logoUrl, phone from restaurant where state = 1 and deleted = false
and title like concat('%', #{param.queryName, typeHandler=com.eghm.handler.mysql.LikeTypeHandler}, '%')
order by id desc
